aa.description: Enables the artisan to craft multiple items at a time.  Higher tiers of this ability increase the maximum crafting quantity.  Conservation of Mass does not apply when Mass Producing, and Mass Produced items will not count for quest updates.
effects: • Increases max crafting quantity by 5.0
• Increases max crafting quantity by 10.0
• Increases max crafting quantity by 25.0
• Increases max crafting quantity by 50.0
• Increases max crafting quantity by 100.0
aa.name: Mass Production
